Title: Mind's Eye
Plot: Mulder and Scully try to get answers out of a stubborn blind woman found at a murder scene who may have the ability to look through the killer's eyes in her mind.
GuestStars: Blu Mankuma, Richard Fitzpatrick, Henri Lubatti, Peter Kelamis, Jason Diablo, Veronica Stocker, Dallas Blake, Joe Pascual, Laurie Brunetti, Rick Dobran, Ralph Alderman, Colin Lawrence, Henry O. Watson, Lili Taylor
